* lab
    * multiple channel
    * soft fading
    * sounds reasonable (8 speakers / 16 speakers)
    * setting
    * source - synce volume level
    * failure mode - all other audio set to 0 (switch
        * safe state 2
        * ICE compute failure modes
    * fade mode
    * Settings
        * THD - total harmonic distortion, two excitors from celling (setting = On/Off)
        * Surround sound - narrow vs wide
* real vehicle
